comment:
* A piece of MessageNode contents representing a message argument and its details.
     * @hide Only a subset of ICU is exposed in Android

methods.name: public String getName()
methods.comment: * @return the argument name string (the decimal-digit string if the argument has a number)

methods.name: public int getNumber()
methods.comment: * @return the argument number, or -1 if none (for a named argument)

methods.name: public String getTypeName()
methods.comment: * @return the argument type string, or null if none was specified

methods.name: public String getSimpleStyle()
methods.comment:
* @return the simple-argument style string,
         *         or null if no style is specified and for other argument types

methods.name: public ComplexArgStyleNode getComplexStyle()
methods.comment:
* @return the complex-argument-style object,
         *         or null if the argument type is NONE_ARG or SIMPLE_ARG
